data.title: Decent Chinese
data.text:
This is your typical American style Chinese restaurant offering all of the usual menu items. The food is average but they do deliver, even in bad weather. Delivery is fast and free. 
No problems ever with the orders. Remember to ask for extra sauce if needed as each order only comes with one soy, one duck.

data.title: Greta Chinese and Excellent Service
data.text: This local restaurant has been in business with the same people running it for over 10 years.  The quality is excellent and the food is ready when you get there.
